channel.title: Nets8 is back - and better than ever for a new project!
channel.description:
Hey guys again! We will be making a new open-source project called Exelation. By open-source I mean that every new version we make, we will release it to you guys. This will be a mission to try to make it as much like as real Runescape as possible.
[b]Planned Updates[/b]
[i]Add a jail system (users who disbehave either automatically or manually from a moderator) will get sent to a cage in Varrock and tele-blocked.[/i]
[i]The rotton tomato store will work and the graphics should be able to be made.[/i]
[i]Spawn most npc's where they're supposed to be (which is easy but should take long :P)[/i]
[i]Get all the skills working besides hunter and construction with the interfaces to pick what to make.[/i]
[i]Get some loops going on around the place.[/i]
[i]Make some mini-games.[/i]
[i]Get some brand-new skills.[/i]
[u]And more![/u]
[b]Hopeful Updates[/b]
[i]Make a discipline system.[/i]
[i]Get hunter and construction working (either exactly the same or with the same concept).[/i]
[i]Get the special bar and specials working bugless for all weapons with gfx and everything.[/i]
[u]And more![/u] ------------------ The jobs available are the following:
[b]Idea Man[/b]
[b]NPC Adder[/b]
[b]Skill Maker[/b]
[b]Minigame Developer[/b]
[b]System Maker[/b]
[b]"Other" Coder[/b]
I am currently the only developer and I will work on the server overall.
Use the following application to apply:
[b]Experience as a Coder:[/b]
[b]What's an int, what's a void, and what's a class (n00b test):[/b]
[b]Job:[/b]
[b]MSN and/or AIM:[/b]
[b]Other:[/b] ----------- Thank you and I hope this project forms into a success. This is not a day project. This will take a long time. I hope the result benefits the whole Runescape private server community!

item.title: Nets8 is back - and better than ever for a new project!
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

Hey guys again! We will be making a new open-source project called Exelation. By open-source I mean that every new version we make, we will release it to you guys. This will be a mission to try to make it as much like as real Runescape as possible.

Planned Updates

Add a jail system (users who disbehave either automatically or manually from a moderator) will get sent to a cage in Varrock and tele-blocked.

The rotton tomato store will work and the graphics should be able to be made.

Spawn most npc’s where they’re supposed to be (which is easy but should take long :P)

Get all the skills working besides hunter and construction with the interfaces to pick what to make.

Get some loops going on around the place.

Make some mini-games.

Get some brand-new skills.

And more!

Hopeful Updates

Make a discipline system.

Get hunter and construction working (either exactly the same or with the same concept).

Get the special bar and specials working bugless for all weapons with gfx and everything.

And more!

The jobs available are the following:

Idea Man

NPC Adder

Skill Maker

Minigame Developer

System Maker

“Other” Coder

I am currently the only developer and I will work on the server overall.

Use the following application to apply:

Experience as a Coder:

What’s an int, what’s a void, and what’s a class (n00b test):

Job:

MSN and/or AIM:

Other:

Thank you and I hope this project forms into a success. This is not a day project. This will take a long time. I hope the result benefits the whole Runescape private server community!

Read full topic
item.source: Nets8 is back - and better than ever for a new project!
